name: seed-bomb
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.
